author: beforeitsnews.com
title: Beware the global threat of U.S. capitalism | Politics
text:
(Before It's News)
After the end of WW2, the U.S. pursued an expanding agenda of imperialism. After all, the U.S. had demonstrated its military strength when it used nuclear weapons in the bombing of Hiroshima and Nagasaki. Who had the means to challenge the U.S. as it strove for world domination?
